'''Duc Remasi Storanzo me Selona''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The duc bel of [Selona](/selona/) is a powerful dwarf in full armor, and one of the principal investors in the [Vailian Trading Company](/vailianTradingCompany/).

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [A Vote of No Confidence](/aVoteOfNoConfidence/)
|none            = 
|other           = * During the trail, it is revealed he has several connections to [The White March](/theWhiteMarch/).
}}

## =Quests

=
* [A Vote of No Confidence](/aVoteOfNoConfidence/): The duc attends the trial of [Director Castol](/directorCastol/).
[Category:Queen's Berth characters](/categoryQueensBerthCharacters/)
[Category:Vailian Trading Company Headquarters characters](/categoryVailianTradingCompanyHeadquartersCharacters/)
